text: Essam al-Buwaydhani was the leader of Jaysh al-Islam. He was allegedly born in the city of Douma and was originally a businessman. He was made leader of Jaysh al-Islam after the previous leader Zahran Alloush was killed in a airstrike by the Syrian Armed Forces in December of 2015. == References == Category:2019 deaths Category:1971 births Category:Islamist insurgents Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Essam al-Buwaydhani
